item.title: 中国加强对无情购债狂潮的警告
item.description: 有迹象表明，购买国债的热潮正在回落，中国通过国家媒体报道加强了对债券多头的警告。【原文：China has ramped up warnings against bond bulls via state-media reports amid signs the frenzy to buy government debt is trickling back.】

item.title: 武伊契奇：欧洲央行必须改善通胀才能在 9 月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）认为，9 月份降息需要欧洲中央银行的通胀前景有所改善。【原文：An interest-rate cut in September would require an improvement in the European Central Bank’s inflation outlook, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 达能押注人口老龄化将推动医疗营养需求增长
item.description: 正在扭亏为盈的法国酸奶生产商达能公司正在加大对癌症患者和老年人营养饮品的投资，押注人口老龄化将促进长期增长。【原文：Danone, the French yogurt maker in the midst of a turnaround, is stepping up investment in nutritional drinks for cancer patients and the elderly, betting an aging population will boost long-term growth.】

item.title: 英国通胀率可能降至 2% 的目标，但拯救苏娜克为时已晚
item.description: 英国通胀率预计将在近三年来首次降至英格兰银行的目标值，但这一里程碑可能对首相苏纳克在 7 月 4 日大选前陷入困境的政府帮助不大。【原文：UK inflation is expected to fall to the Bank of England’s target for the first time in almost three years, but the milestone may do little to help Prime Minister Rishi Sunak’s beleaguered government ahead of the July 4 general election.】

item.title: 中国向企业发放数十年前的税单，暗示资金困难
item.description: 中国地方政府已要求多家公司缴纳上世纪 90 年代的税款，这凸显了在经济复苏不平衡和房地产持续低迷的情况下，地方政府对资金的需求。【原文：Local governments in China have asked several companies to pay tax bills dating back as far as the 1990s, underscoring their need for funding given the uneven economic recovery and persistent housing slump.】

item.title: 中国水力发电量激增 铝产量创历史新高
item.description: 由于冶炼厂恢复了闲置产能，中国上个月的铝产量创下了历史新高，这有可能使铝价在 5 月份创下两年新高后进一步下跌。【原文：China’s aluminum production hit a record last month as smelters brought back idled capacity, potentially setting up the market for further declines after prices hit a two-year high in May.】

item.title: 中国经济数据喜忧参半 工业金属跌势加剧
item.description: 铁矿石下跌超过 2%，铜也延续了近期的跌势，因为中国的经济数据凸显了持续的疲软态势，尤其是在金属密集型的房地产行业。【原文：Iron ore fell more than 2% and copper extended its recent decline after economic data from China highlighted continued weak spots — especially in its metals-intensive property sector.】

item.title: 现代汽车和供应商股价在首尔上涨，印度部门申请首次公开募股
item.description: 可能成为印度有史以来规模最大的首次公开募股之一的计划提振了现代汽车公司的股价，使其有望创下历史新高。【原文：Plans for what may be one of India’s largest-ever initial public offerings boosted shares of Hyundai Motor Co., putting them on course for a record high.】

item.title: 中国工业产出降温，零售支出超预期
item.description: 中国 5 月份工业扩张放缓，而零售支出超出预期，这表明经济复苏中的失衡现象可能正在缓解。【原文：China’s industrial expansion slowed in May while retail spending beat forecasts in a sign that imbalances in the economic recovery may be easing.】

item.title: 花旗集团在日本组建团队，以中型企业的发展为目标
item.description: 花旗集团正在寻求加强与日本中型企业的业务往来，这家华尔街银行正在全球范围内加快努力，扩大其客户基础。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is seeking to strengthen its business with medium-size companies in Japan as the Wall Street bank accelerates efforts across the globe to broaden its customer base.】

item.title: 尽管采取了更多刺激措施，中国房价仍加速下滑
item.description: 5 月份，中国房价下跌速度加快，因为中国为支持房地产市场所做的最有力的努力需要时间来重振需求。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a faster pace in May, as the country’s most forceful efforts to support the property market took time to revive demand.】

item.title: 即使经济反弹，中国仍被排除在新兴市场股票基金之外
item.description: 中国股市从 1 月份的低点反弹，但这并没有阻止它被排除在几只新的发展中市场股票基金之外。【原文：The Chinese equity market’s rebound from its January lows has done little to curtail its exclusion from several new developing market equity funds.】

item.title: 中国数据公布前，石油保持四月以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 由于交易商在等待中国的贸易数据，这些数据将为世界头号原油进口国的经济实力提供一个缩影，石油保持了自四月初以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Oil held its biggest weekly advance since early April as traders waited for Chinese trade data that will provide a snapshot on the economic strength of the world’s top crude importer.】

item.title: 法国反对极右翼的保障措施开始瓦解
item.description: 几代人以来，法国当权者都有一个默契，即阻止极右翼政党接近国家政权。这种模式已开始瓦解。【原文：For generations, the French establishment had a tacit agreement that prevented far-right parties from getting close to national power. That model is starting to come apart.】

item.title: 全球情绪低迷，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于对法国政治危机的担忧加剧了全球市场的焦虑情绪，而本周央行的一系列决定可能预示着期待已久的宽松周期将推迟，亚洲股市早盘将下跌。【原文：Asian stocks are set to fall in early trading as concern over a political crisis in France fans anxiety in global markets, while a flurry of central bank decisions this week may signal delays to the long-awaited easing cycle.】

item.description: 随着美国加工商到国外寻找更便宜的原材料，来自巴西的牛肉脂肪正进入美国生物燃料领域。经常被忽视的锰今年在其他商品中大放异彩。电动汽车电池充斥全球，这种情况有可能削弱未来的需求。【原文：Beef fat from Brazil is finding its way into American biofuels as US processors look abroad for cheaper raw materials. Often-overlooked manganese is outshining other commodities this year. And the world is awash with electric car batteries — a situation that threatens to undermine future demand.】

item.title: 通胀持续升温，澳大利亚央行将关键利率维持在 12 年高位
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二可能会将其关键利率维持在12年来的最高水平，因为它正试图抑制因就业市场极度紧张而受到支撑的消费价格。【原文：Australia’s central bank will likely hold its key interest rate at a 12-year high on Tuesday as it tries to restrain consumer prices that have been underpinned by an ultra-tight employment market.】
